question: Veteran Leader Motilal Vora, who recently passed away, was the Chief Minister of which state?
explanation:
Veteran Congress leader and former Governor of Uttar Pradesh Motilal Vohra recently passed away at the age of 93.
He also served as the 13th Madhya Pradesh Chief minister in 1989 and a Rajya Sabha member from Chhattisgarh from 2002 to 2020.
